DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability immunogenicity three lot 13-valent pneumococcal vaccine give healthy infant . Lots study consistency immune response , well non-inferiority safety compare 7-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine In Healthy Infants
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy 2 month old infant Available duration study reachable telephone Able complete two blood drawing procedure study Exclusion criterion : Previous vaccination , contraindication history allergic reaction vaccine vaccine component Bleeding disorder , immune deficiency significant chronic congenital disease Previous receipt blood product immune globulin
